revised_title: Spermiogenesis in Eledone cirrhosa: A Study of Male Reproductive System in Octopoda
tldr: This study examines the process of spermiogenesis in Eledone cirrhosa, a species of octopus. The research focuses on the ultrastructure and changes that occur in the sperm cells during the spermiogenesis process. The findings provide insights into the complex structure of the sperm cells and the role of microtubules in the formation of the mature nucleus.
